channel.title: Roboflow on Jordi Smit
channel.description: Recent content in Roboflow on Jordi Smit

item.title: How to Upload (Pre)-Annotations to Roboflow
item.description: I’m a big fan of Roboflow. They have one of the most user-friendly labeling interfaces. I have been using it for quite some time now.

item.title: How to avoid orientation bugs in Computer Vision labeling?
item.description: A while back, I encountered the strangest bug. I was labeling an instance segmentation dataset, and to make the task easier, I had set up an active learning pipeline.
